title: Sans-Serif character set serious help needed!!
content:
[[LINK] Texture file @ Imageshack](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104708/http:/img166.imageshack.us/my.php?image=txt28910ld0.png)  
Hi,  
 I posted this a few weeks ago, albeit with-out \*much\* response.  
 Can someone help me A) find a \*free\* version of this font, or B) create a TTF file out of this texture?  
Thanks.

(P.S. - Only focusing on the Latin characters.)

 [‹ serif - I'm stumped](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104708/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45145 "Go to previous forum topic") [what's this font? I have seen it lots before, but cant remember the name...... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104708/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45133 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dtr138

comments.content: There’s no such thing as a free lunch!

I don’t think dtr138 understands how many days/weeks it would take to make the font, and how impossible it would be to do a good job with such a small sample size.

Vjrrtd.

Y
I am dumbfounded by the lack of values that would even generate a request like this! Not once, but twice! But it is only half as bad because they only want the Latin side.
